Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Lizard's Language
Description: You meet Xuanyin again, who was buried in thoughts...
QuestDesc: You meet Xuanyin again, who was buried in thoughts...

Conditions.PreQuestName: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Frog's Language

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Silver-Banded Lizard, Azure Lizard, Green Pit Lizard... Oh, hey, {PlayerName}, you're here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dishes? Where would you find such specialties?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my, where was I? Well, I'll start over again later.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was counting the language samples of lizards. The dialects of the lizards are almost catching up with the fish. It took me months to collect them all, but the performance of the translation module is somewhat not ideal.

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you have samples of the Viridblaze Saurian?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? The Viridblaze Saurian? I really haven't considered that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In terms of classification, the Viridblaze Saurian is a mimicry Tacet Discord, classified as a Howler.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though the Viridblaze Saurian and ordinary lizards have lots in common, it's a TD in essence. I don't have the courage to research it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But now with you here, I think I can give it a try.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like it has something to say!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: OH MY GOODNESS! It's tail is swinging over! The invincible {PlayerName}, do something!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The program crashed! Seems like this module can't be used on TDs! Quick, kill the background processes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me see. Well, though they are all interjections, they still have great scientific potential.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I shouldn't have messed with a TD. Fortunately, you were here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Today's trial and error was very valuable. Thank you for your help, {PlayerName}.
